column3: College of Medical, Veterinary & Life Sciences
column5: Watch our latest Ask your academic webinar to find out more about this programme.A joint programme between the School of Molecular Biosciences and the School of Chemistry (SoC).It will provide advanced training in the areas of synthetic chemistry, biologically active molecules, and detailed knowledge of the biophysical characterisation techniques that can be used to examine these systems. Aimed at students with either a good Chemistry or a Biological Sciences undergraduate degree and will train its graduates with state-of-the-art knowledge of the core areas of the chemical biology field.
column7: Watch our latest Ask your academic webinar to find out more about this programme.
